lead_paragraph: Major stock indexes flipped from losses to gains then back to losses again following a rebound in crude oil prices. Citigroup and Netflix reported solid results.

headline.print_headline: Market Off Slightly, Despite Decent Earnings Reports
headline.main: Market Ticks Down as Investors Assess Earnings and Greek Debt Crisis

snippet: Major stock indexes flipped from losses to gains then back to losses again following a rebound in crude oil prices. Citigroup and Netflix reported solid results.
abstract: Stocks end slightly lower after day of mixed trading, as investors weigh quarterly results and entry of new companies into market.
